title: Sell Me Your Climate Bombs
description: There are tanks all over the U.S. that are like little climate change time bombs, ticking away. Today on the show, getting to them before they go off. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Sell Me Your Climate Bombs
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: There's this greenhouse gas out there that's thousands of times more dangerous than carbon dioxide, lurking in garages and sheds all over the country.
itunes:subtitle: There's this greenhouse gas out there that's thousands of times more dangerous than carbon dioxide, lurking in garages and sheds all over the country.
